item.title: 美国军方表示，也门胡塞叛军本月早些时候对一艘悬挂伯利兹国旗的船只发动的袭击造成了长达 18 英里的浮油。美国军方还警告说，船上装载的化肥有泄漏的危险。
item.description:
An attack by Yemeni Houthi rebels on a Belize-flagged ship earlier this month caused an 18-mile oil slick, the U.S. military said. It also warned of the danger of a spill from the vessel's cargo of fertilizer. https://t.co/IWKoqDW5qY

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 密西西比州官员称，两名国民警卫队队员周五在密西西比州的一次例行训练飞行中乘坐的军用直升机坠毁，造成两人死亡。密西西比州州长说，两人都在位于图佩罗的密西西比国民警卫队陆军航空支援设施服役。
item.description:
Two National Guardsmen are dead after their military helicopter crashed in Mississippi during a routine training flight on Friday, officials said. Both served at a Mississippi National Guard Army aviation support facility in Tupelo, the governor said.https://t.co/zhfNbsG68K pic.twitter.com/TJIXTauXdC

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 新公布的录像显示，非二元制青少年奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在高中发生肢体冲突一天后死亡，她描述了导致打架的原因。
item.description:
Newly released footage shows Nex Benedict, a nonbinary teen who died one day after a physical altercation at their high school, describing what led up to the fight. https://t.co/gD6F4Wc6ls

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 英国执政党保守党在一名议员指责伦敦市长萨迪克-汗（Sadiq Khan）受伊斯兰教徒控制后，暂停了与该议员的联系，以色列-哈马斯战争引发的紧张局势令英国政坛动荡不安。
item.description:
The U.K.’s governing Conservative Party has suspended ties with one if its lawmakers after he accused London Mayor Sadiq Khan of being controlled by Islamists, as tensions over the Israel-Hamas war roil British politics. https://t.co/kwuLEGqKgv

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：以美国和英国为首的多国联军对也门胡塞武装发动了新一轮打击，"以回应胡塞武装在红海及其周边地区对商船和海军船只的持续袭击"。

item.title: 新公布的人体摄影机录像显示，非二元制青少年奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在高中与其他几名学生发生肢体冲突后一天死亡。
item.description:
Newly released body camerage footage shows Nex Benedict, a nonbinary teen who died one day after a physical altercation with several other students at their high school, describing what led up to the fight during an interview with police from the hospital. https://t.co/s2DwhmmBrQ

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024
